WorkItem.Description:
Hi, the EU armory now uses the new version, because 2.2.8 gives an error.
Problem is, the 2.2.9 displays "no character returned from armory"
 
Armory is UP (i can browse it)
 
Any ideas?

Comments.Message: forgot to say, Deafknight from Turalyon (EU)
That means that Rawr isn't able to contact the Armory (or you typo'd). That could be to a variety of things, like proxies, firewalls, routers, etc. Make sure that none of those are in the way.

solved, i didnt activate the proxy in the new 2.2.9 exe.
With all the features for auto update there is in .NET, you could think there could be a better way of upgrading than installing a brand new install each time, but meh.

works ok ^^
That's one of the things that's changed in Rawr3.
